FuncDef: The display system tcam match-rules command displays matched entries. The display system tcam match-rules command displays matched entries.
CLIs: display system tcam match-rules slot <slot-id> [ [ ingress | egress | group <group-id> ] | [ delay-time <time-value> ] ]
display system tcam match-rules slot <slot-id> [ [ chip <chip-id> ] | [ ingress | egress | group <group-id> ] ]
display system tcam match-rules slot <slot-id> [ [ chip <chip-id> ] | [ ingress | group <group-id> ] ]
display system tcam match-rules slot <slot-id> [ [ ingress | group <group-id> ] | [ delay-time <time-value> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the outbound direction.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
-

Specifies a group ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the time delay.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 10.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the chip ID.
The value is an integer. It must be the ID of an available chip.

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to view matched entries. If ingress, egress, group group-id, delay-time time-value, and chip chip-id are not specified, all matched entries on a device are displayed.
